typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		transaction_id as string,
		cust_id as integer,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as double,
		total_amt as double,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(key_1 as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,2),
		total_amt as decimal(12,2),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		customer_id = cust_id,
		Transaction_key = key_1,
		transaction_id,
		prod_subcat_code,
		prod_cat_code,
		Qty,
		Rate,
		Tax,
		total_amt,
		Store_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		transaction_id as string,
		cust_id as integer,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as double,
		total_amt as double,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 0) ~> Transacation
source(output(
		D_KEY as integer,
		customer_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select D_KEY,customer_Id from D_customer',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> lkpcustomer
source(output(
		Src_Tab as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select [Src_Tab],[Watermark_Value] from config',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> incremental
source(output(
		max_Transaction_key as integer,
		out_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nselect max(Transaction_key) as max_Transaction_key,\'1\' as out_key from Transactions\n',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> maxsurgatekey
source(output(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,9),
		total_amt as decimal(12,9),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> lkptransaction
Transacation derive(tran_date = toTimestamp(tran_date,'dd-MM-yyyy'),
		source_tablename = 'Transactions',
		input_key = '1') ~> datatypechange
incrementaljoin, lkpcustomer lookup(cust_id == customer_Id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcustomer
datatypechange, incremental join(source_tablename == Src_Tab,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> incrementaljoin
Lookupcustomer filter(tran_date > Watermark_Value) ~> Filterdata
Filterdata, lkptransaction exists(Transacation@transaction_id == lkptransaction@transaction_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> updateflow
updateflow alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Filterdata, lkptransaction exists(Transacation@transaction_id == lkptransaction@transaction_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> insertflow
insertflow, maxsurgatekey lookup(input_key == out_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 keyGenerate(output(surgate_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(out_surgatekey = max_Transaction_key + surgate_key) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,2),
		total_amt as decimal(12,2),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['transaction_id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	postSQLs:['update config set [Watermark_Value]= (select max(tran_date) from Transactions)'],
	mapColumn(
		transaction_id,
		tran_date,
		prod_subcat_code,
		prod_cat_code,
		Qty,
		Rate,
		Tax,
		total_amt,
		Store_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> transactionUPDATEflow
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		transaction_id as string,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as decimal(12,2),
		total_amt as decimal(12,2),
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		transaction_id = out_surgatekey,
		customer_Key = D_KEY,
		customer_id = cust_id,
		tran_date,
		prod_subcat_code,
		prod_cat_code,
		Qty,
		Rate,
		Tax,
		total_amt,
		Store_type,
		transaction_id
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> transactionInsertFlow
